title: Q11 Organization Drag-and-Drop
prompt: Drag the sentences into a logical order to make a paragraph.
feedback: The paragraph is describing the scientific method, which has ordered steps. The steps should be described in logical order. Each step logically leads to the next. The first sentence introduces what the scientific method is. The second sentence describes how the scientific method starts. The third sentence builds on the second. The beginning of the sentence, “when you have background information,” shows that this sentence follows the second. The fourth sentence is about testing your hypothesis. Since the third sentence talks about constructing your hypothesis, this sentence logically follows. Finally, the fifth sentence talks about refining your hypothesis and planning more testing. It logically concludes the paragraph.
